alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 4:35PM EST until March 03 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM CST /11 PM EST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow expected, including thundersnow. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 to 6 inches with the highest near and east of the Indiana state line. Winds gusting as high as 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Illinois and northwest Indiana. * WHEN...Until 10 PM CST /11 PM EST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous travel due to snow and slush covered roads. Strong winds will further reduce visibility to under one quarter mile at times in falling snow and bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates of up to 1 to 2 inches per hour will occur within any bands of heavy snow through early evening. This will result in hazardous to locally dangerous travel conditions during the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. In Illinois, the latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com. In Indiana, the latest road conditions for Indiana are available by calling 1-800- 261-7623.
